/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and cars, creating a vibrant tableau of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both lively and serene.
